data.actual_result: Emojis will shrink as if alphabet characters are inputted
data.expected_result: Both emojis should appear slightly larger than usual
data.short_description: Native emotes will not jumbo if they are alone in chat box or have emojis on the side
data.steps_to_repro: - type random local emoji such as 🚓 and then a discord uploaded emoji - Send to chat
